title: Commission Decision of 14 July 1988 adopting the list of the regions eligible under the Community scheme to encourage the cessation of farming
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 14 July 1988
adopting the list of the regions eligible under the Community scheme to encourage the cessation of farming
(88/470/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The regions eligible under Article 10 (3) of Regulation (EEC) No 1096/88 shall be those listed in the Annex.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 July 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 110, 29. 4. 1988, p. 1.
ANNEX
List of regions eligible under Article 10 (3) of Regulation (EEC) No 1096/88
I. Regions where the composite indicator is more than 75 % but less than 85 % of the Community indicator:
- Italy: Abbruzzi, Sardegna
- United Kingdom: Northern Ireland
- Spain: Pais Vasco, Rioja, Baleares.
II. Regions where the composite indicator is less than 75 % of the Community indicator:
- Italy: Campania, Molise, Puglia, Basilicata, Calabria, Sicilia
- Ireland: whole territory
- Greece: whole territoy
- Spain: whole territory, except regions listed under I above
- Portugal: whole territory.
